display_long_description:
Experience the ultimate front row musical journey with AMAZE VR Concerts.

Immerse yourself in high-quality VR concerts featuring live action footage of your favorite artists in stunningly rendered 3D VR environments. Our ever-expanding selection of concerts allows you to access your favorites artists, genres and styles in ways you’ve never imagined.

Discover electrifying performances from featured artists like TOMORROW X TOGETHER, Avenged Sevenfold, T-Pain, Megan Thee Stallion, Zara Larsson & UPSAHL.

# FEATURES
- **Free Song for Every Artist.** If you like what you see, you can purchase the full concert. No subscriptions necessary
- **Unparalleled Quality** with high fidelity 8K footage. You’ll feel like the artist is performing right in front of you!
- **Up Close and Personal Performances.** Make eye contact with artists as they perform exclusively for you and enjoy immersive musical experiences like never before

Download AMAZE VR Concerts today and immerse yourself in an unforgettable experience. With more concerts on the way, you won’t want to miss out.

# ABOUT AMAZE
- Our Goal: To provide a space where every artist can create their own VR concert and every fan can experience front-row seats to their favorite artist
- Recognized as one of the “Most Innovative Companies” by Fast Company AmazeVR Concerts set a new standard in immersive music experiences
- Webby Awards Nominee for Best Immersive Experience
- Official Selection at SXSW 2022&2023
